component.name: DownloadListReader
component.script:
sub init() m.top.functionName = "getContent" end sub
sub getContent() request = createObject("roUrlTransfer") request.SetCertificatesFile("common:/certs/ca-bundle.crt") request.AddHeader("X-Roku-Reserved-Dev-Id", "") request.InitClientCertificates() request.setUrl(m.top.downloadsUri) response = parseJson(request.getToString())
downloadList = createObject("RoSGNode", "ContentNode") hashes = createObject("roArray", response.Count()) i = 0 for each download in response entry = downloadList.createChild("ContentNode") entry.title = download["Name"] hashes[i] = download["Hash"] i++ end for
m.top.downloadList = downloadList end sub
